description: The address of the MCTP bus owner device
The MTU for the interface's link. Note that this is
the MTU for the BMC-side of the exchange, and is
separate from any peripheral device's MTU. A
peripheral device's MTU must be configured via
upper-layer protocols running atop MCTP and cannot be
described in MCTPDevice.
The name of the interface
The MCTP network of in which the interface
participates. If no network is specified the interface
will participate in the default network
The physical transport backing the interface.
See Table 3 of DSP0239 v1.10.0. The value of
BusOwner and MCTPDevice's Address property must be
interpreted in the context of the value of its
interface's Transport.
The physical address for the device on the bus.
The name of the MCTP interface exposed by the kernel
to which the device is connected
A recognisable name for the device
Assign the provided endpoint ID to the device
and exclude the EID from the dynamic allocation pool.
If StaticEndpointID is not defined then the device
will be allocated an endpoint ID from the dynamic
pool.
